data.eml:eml: Status of the cardinalfish genus Apogonoides and its type species Apogonoides macassariensis (Percomorpha: Apogonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fraser, Thomas H., Bogorodsky, Sergey V. (2019): Status of the cardinalfish genus Apogonoides and its type species Apogonoides macassariensis (Percomorpha: Apogonidae). Zootaxa 4577 (3): 579-584, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4577.3.11
